Trinkets

Gloves, gauntlets etc.

You can wear gloves to cover your hand slot. They can be enchanted randomly with one of the Clothing enhancements or be one of the named drops found below.

Arcane Gloves
  • Spell Penetration I Spell Penetration I: Passive: +1 Equipment bonus to Spell Penetration checks.

Backstabber's Gloves (Level 12)
  • Bluff +10Bluff +10: Passive: +10 Competence bonus to the Bluff skill.
  • Sneak Attack Bonus +3Sneak Attack Bonus +3: Provides a +3 to attack bonus and a +5 to damage for any attack that would qualify as a Sneak Attack, even if the wielder is not a Rogue.
  • DeceptionDeception: This weapon is hard to focus upon and thus provides a +3 enhancement bonus to Bluff checks. In addition, Deception weapons have a small chance to envelop the target in darkness, making them vulnerable to sneak attacks for a short time.

Brawling Gloves (Level 12)
  • Upgradeable - Tier 1
  • Strength +4 Strength +4: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +4 enhancement bonus to Strength.
  • Spike-StuddedSpike-Studded: This item is reinforced with metal studs that improve your unarmed strikes. Your unarmed attacks do an additional 1 to 4 piercing damage.
  • Glass Jaw StrikeGlass Jaw Strike: While wearing this item, when you roll a natural 20 on an unarmed attack, you will deal a tremendous blow to your target that will daze it (as the Sap ability) and may knock it down as well.
    • Upgradeable - Tier 2
      • Adds Sneak Attack Bonus +3Sneak Attack Bonus +3: Provides a +3 to attack bonus and a +5 to damage for any attack that would qualify as a Sneak Attack, even if the wielder is not a Rogue.
    • Upgradeable - Tier 3
      • Strength +4 Strength +4: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +4 enhancement bonus to Strength. → Strength +5 Strength +5: This item gives the wearer the power of Ogre Strength, granting a +5 enhancement bonus to Strength.
